original_text: But my name is the Lord Almighty. I am strong and I will rescue my people. I will fight hard to save them. I will bring peace to their land. But the people of Babylonia will only have trouble.’ But my name is the Lord Almighty. I am strong and I will rescue my people. I will fight hard to save them. I will bring peace to their land. But the people of Babylonia will only have trouble.’ But my name is the Lord Almighty.
korean_text: 그들의 구원자는 강하니 그의 이름은 만군의 여호와라 반드시 그들 때문에 싸우시리니 그 땅에 평안함을 주고 바벨론 주민은 불안하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: But my name is the Lord Almighty.
I am strong
and I will rescue my people.
I will fight hard to save them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 구하기 위해 힘써 싸울 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will bring peace to their land.
But the people of Babylonia will only have trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 바빌로니아 사람들은 고난만 겪을 것이다.
